attributes.action: Reject any proposals to introduce tag and beacon technology for motorbikes or any other vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over recent months the DVLA and Transport for London have been investigating and testing the use of chips or tags in number plates. This technology would allow law enforcement & civil service officials to track tagged vehicles by way of handheld receivers or roadside beacons.
The introduction of such technology would not only open up motorbikes and other vehicles to road pricing and congestion charging on a national level, but would strike yet another blow at the heart of the freedoms of the British motorist.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reject any proposals to introduce tag and beacon technology for motorbikes or any other vehicles."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
